Hydras:

"That's a point that I havent think yet" replied Hydras "But I have some 
ideas to built a safer base and the best of all totally under my control as 
I like, I wont like to take chances"

-----Original Message----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Tuesday, October 19, 2010 1:34 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: The wrath of the Hydra/The return of a decepticon

> <OLD>
>
> "I never underestimate my enemies"and for you question I think that my 
> first
> concern is increase my troops numbers and improve my defences. Taking in
> count that my former Segurity Chief is a tratior to Predacon cause I need 
> a
> full remake of my base. I dont like... Unpleasants visits"

<NEW>

Cryotek nodded, "So you have lost your security chief have you?." he
said. His voice deepening as he furrowed his brow thoughtfully. He
chuckled lightly as he glanced sly at the dark form of Obsidian who
still continued to hover at one of the security stations.

He looked back at Hydras, "Soooooo, will you then be moving your base,
or reconstructing it?" He waved his hand in the air a little, "You
know, totally rebuilding bases are so . . . time consuming. Especially
when you can just take over one."

(TAG)

Preston
